page.title: 10EDUCATIONAL PROVISION(Cont.)
page.content:
last three years have helped the N.S.P.C.C.,Dr.Barnardo's and the Save The Children Fund. Many fund raising activities take place within the school including Jumble Sales and Summer Fayres whilst out-of-school activites include horse-riding.
{STANLEY JUNIOR SCHOOL.} The school was opened in 1939 by the Blackpool Borough Education Committee to serve the developing area of Blackpool along Preston New Road and to the East of Stanley Park.An Infants School was built alongside the Junior School in 1950.The Schools came under the control of Lancashire County in 1974.Today Stanley Juniors has 301 pupils and 12 staff. Each school day begins with an assembly in which prayers are said
